H

heal() - Method in class entities.Player
This method gives 1 health point back to the player and makes sure they only have the maximum amount of health.
HEART - Static variable in class utils.LoadSave
Where the player health HEART representation is located
hearts - Variable in class ui.HUD
Buffered Image to represent Hearts
height - Variable in class entities.Entity
How wide the Entity is
height - Variable in class ui.HUD
Height of the Portrait Sprite
height - Variable in class ui.PauseButton
The left coordinate
HelperMethods - Class in utils
This class is full of various methods that will be called by more than just one entity, object, or class
HelperMethods() - Constructor for class utils.HelperMethods
 
hidden - Variable in class levels.Level
This keeps track of if this level is able to be played by the user or if it should be hidden from them.
hidden - Variable in class ui.OverworldButton
Represents if the level is hidden from the user or not
HIDDEN - Static variable in class utils.Constants.OverworldButtonConstants
The color of buttons representing hidden levels
HIDDEN_HIGHLIGHT - Static variable in class utils.Constants.OverworldButtonConstants
The color of buttons representing hidden levels when the mouse is over it
HIT - Static variable in class utils.Constants.EnemyConstants
the animation index correlating to the HIT (taking damage) animation
hitbox - Variable in class entities.Entity
The area that represents where the Entity can interact with objects/environment/other Entities.
hitbox - Variable in class projectiles.Projectile
The hitbox of the projectile (where it can hit other in-game objects)
HITBOX_HEIGHT - Static variable in class utils.Constants.PlayerStates
This is how tall the players hit box will be in game - scaled
HITBOX_WIDTH - Static variable in class utils.Constants.PlayerStates
This is how wide the players hit box will be in game - scaled
hitboxOffset - Variable in class entities.Player
Calculated Y-Positional change offset for jumping/falling
hitboxYOffset - Variable in class entities.Enemy
The image offset from top side of image to top side of hitbox.
hud - Variable in class states.Playing
The Heads Up Display (HUD) that will be shown
HUD - Class in ui
The HUD or Heads Up Display will always be visible during gameplay to inform the player of their score, their current health, and the enemies remaining
HUD(Playing) - Constructor for class ui.HUD
Constructor class to instantiate the elements that make up the HUD
hudbg - Variable in class ui.HUD
Buffered Image to represent the HUD background
HUDBG - Static variable in class utils.LoadSave
Where the hud background image is located
hudFont - Variable in class ui.HUD
The font used for the HUD as well as other parts of the game
hurt() - Method in class entities.Player
This method will give 1 damage to the player and check if they have died.
hurt(int) - Method in class entities.Enemy
This function will subtract what ever damage is inputed into this method from the entity total health.
hurting - Variable in class entities.Enemy
This shows if the Enemy is in the state of being hurt.
hurting - Variable in class entities.Player
A boolean indicating whether the player is currently hurting.
